responsibilities: Run experiments, tests, and large-scale distributed jobs in support of AI product features.
Lead a variety of coding projects in different programming languages with a focus on addressing machine learning and data science challenges.
Participate in and lead upstream data science and machine learning project communities.
Evaluate new machine learning and data science technologies.
Evangelize, communicate, and promote machine learning and data science technologies and ongoing machine learning projects with a variety of technical and non-technical stakeholders.
Transition software components from research into product.
skills: Advanced programming skills in Python and SQL.
Knowledge of machine learning relevant mathematics and statistics.
Ability to context switch between multiple concurrent projects.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
Positive attitude and willingness to share ideas openly.
analysis: The job responsibilities focus on running experiments, leading coding projects, participating in data science communities, evaluating new technologies, and transitioning software components from research to product. These tasks are related to machine learning and data science in general but do not specifically mention Generative AI or language models. The skills required include advanced programming, knowledge of machine learning mathematics and statistics, and communication skills, which are applicable to a broad range of machine learning and data science roles. There is no explicit mention of working with Generative AI or language models in either the responsibilities or skills sections.
